 It wasn't all that long ago when Americans would hang a man for stealing a horse, and they didn't hang him in some back room with 10 witnesses, no they Strung him up in the town square for all to see. Damn sure made the next guy think twice before he went after someones Horse...
 
 Take this current shooting for instance. There were at least 100 witnesses who saw this XXXXX shoot down all those people. But with all the bleeding hearts in this country this guy will probably not serve one day in prison. He's INNOCENT until proven guilty under our current system of Law. The fact that this was a premeditated act is enough proof to believe he is not insane , he planned this and carried it out. IMO they should take him out and load him into a big cannon, shoot him into a brick wall and sell the event on Pay Per view. Not only could we use the Money to help pay down the debt in this country, but we would save a few Million on a trial to PROVE him guilty even though we already know he did it. I bet the next Whacko who decides to go on a killing spree would think twice about it.
